participant_1.background:
I prefer to listen to my own music on my own terms.
I have a system for doing laundry that works well for me.
I like to listen to the band Red Hot Chili Peppers to remember my dad.
i volunteer in my son s boy scout troop.
i freeze up in social situations.

participant_2.background:
I got to know my girlfriend better in the past year.
I decided to travel the world with my sister, Mary.
i am an avid fisherman.
I like to share my recipes with my friends and learn new ones from them.
and , my best friend is calden.

content.text: How has the past year been for you?
I got to know my girlfriend better and I decided to travel the world with my sister Mary.
That's great! I am glad you are happy. I like to volunteer in my son's boy scout troop.
That sounds really nice! I am glad you find volunteering to be a good use of your time.
Yeah, it really is. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go fishing and I like to learn new recipes and share them with my friends.
That's cool! I like to listen to the Red Hot Chili Peppers and I like to keep my own system of doing laundry.
I like listening to the Red Hot Chili Peppers too! My best friend Calden is also a huge fan of theirs.
That's great! I am glad you have a best friend to share your interests with.
Thanks! I hope you have a great day.
